column5: Does anyone know what the current exchange rate is now? Thanks
The rate has been in the area of 1.36 for the last few weeks.

Anyone not giving you $1.30 (30%) for your US Dollar right now is ripping you off big time. Avoid this as much as possible by using your credit card or bank/check card for everything you can. You'll get banks rates for that day.
